overview:
Paul Stevens, the CTO of Reachable, is a well-respected thought-leader and senior software engineer in the field of graph theory, analytics, and databases. Prior to 7 Degrees, Paul was a Senior Software Engineer at Cogito, a Manager at Brooks Automation, and a Simulation Analyst at AutoSimulations (which was acquired by Brooks Automation).

Paul has earned a Master of Science in Industrial Engineering from the Georgia Institute of Technology.
